title: Protected End Blocks
description_short: Prevent The Enderdragon from breaking all end blocks and more
description: Prevent The Enderdragon from breaking a wider range of end dimension blocks as well as hard blocks or utility blocks

features.label: The Enderdragon is unable to destroy a wide range of End Dimension blocks including: variants of End stone, Purper, Chorus plants or flowers, Dragon heads and eggs, Ender Chests
Other Protected blocks include all colours of banners and shulker boxes, purple stained glass and panes, all types of signs and Lodestones
Hard blocks such as Netherite blocks, Ancient debris, Beacons plus its pyramid blocks (Iron, Gold, Diamond and Emerald), and Amethyst blocks cannot be destroyed by the dragon
Map making blocks such as the light block have been protected
Compatible with Minecraft 1.13 and up, last tested on Minecraft 1.20
